meanings.definition: A person who is in the same class or school as another.
meanings.sent1: My classmates and I study together in school.
meanings.sent2: During recess, my classmates play games on the playground.
meanings.sent3: My classmates always make me laugh with their jokes.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of students, my classmates shine like stars.
meanings.sent5: The bond with my classmates is as strong as steel.

meanings.sent1: I have many classmates in different subjects.
meanings.sent2: Our class photo includes all my classmates from the year.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with chatter from my classmates.
meanings.sent4: The group project was completed by my classmates efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of my classmates echoes in the hallway.
